segments.original_transcript: Good afternoon, thank you for calling RTC, my name is Tanveer, how can I help you? Hello, I am speaking in Telugu. Telugu language? Yes, Telugu. Ok, so please be online, I am transferring your call to Telugu agent, be online. Ok. Thank you. Thank you. Thank you. Hello. Hello, Namaste Amma. Namaste Sir. Your call has been transferred to Telugu agent, my name is Ramya, tell me. There is an all-rounder in Sunfish, salt, sweet and biscuits. Ok. How much salt is there and how much sweet is there? I am a diabetic patient, is there more sugar or less? Sir, just a minute, I will check and tell you. Yes, tell me. Sunfish, salt and sweet? What? There is an all-rounder, right? Yes, Amma. Variant agency, Sunfish, all-rounder, sweet and salt? Yes, there is sweet and salt. How much sweet is there? Packet is Rs. 5 and packet is Rs. 10. Just a minute. Sir, you have product details at the back of the packet, right? Did you see there? What? Sir, at the back of the packet? Packet is Rs. 5 and packet is Rs. 10. There is sweet in it. I am a diabetic patient, is there more sweet or less? Sir, at the back of the packet, you can see the gramage. How much sugar is there and how much salt is there? Let me see. Gramage is Rs. 5 and RSA is Rs. 018 per gram. Rs. 5 of all is there. No, no, sir. At the back of the packet, there is a column called Nutritional Information. Energy, protein, carbohydrate, total sugar, total fat, what all is added? Sir, at the back of the packet, there is a column called Nutritional Information. It is not given. Packet is Rs. 5. Sir, at the back of the packet, there is a column called Nutritional Information. There is no more. Sir, do you have more sunfish? Okay. Is there sugar less? No, no, sir. There is no sugar less biscuit, sir. No? If you want, you can try Sunfish Marilite Active Oats Biscuit for health conscious. Is there pure salt? Yes, sir. What? Yes, sir. There is salt. Is there? Yes, sir. I am calling from Rajamundry. Okay. In Big Bazaar, there are department stores. In Rajamundry, do you give biscuits in all the stores? Sir, you can get biscuits in all the stores. You give salt and sunfish, right? Sunfish? Yes. What? What did you say, sir? Sunfish? Sunfish, right? Yes, sir. Sunfish. Yes. In sunfish, you give salt and biscuits, right? Sunfish, salt and which biscuits? Sir, which biscuits do you want? Are you asking Marilite or Sunfish Sweet and Salt? Yes, sir. Salt and biscuits. It is sugar less, right? It is okay if there is salt, right? It is sugar less, right? Sunfish? No, sir. It is okay if there is salt, right? It is sugar less, right? No, sir. There is no salt and biscuits separately, sir. I said oats biscuits. Sunfish has active oats. You can try those oats biscuits. Oats? Yes. Oats. Sunfish has oats. Correct, sir. Sunfish has oats. It is called biscuit. Oats. Okay, madam. Okay. Can I know your name? My name is Srimachalam. Srimachalam. Okay. Can I know your information, sir? Okay. Okay. Okay. Okay. Okay, sir. Thank you so much for calling ITC. Have a great day. Thanks. Okay, sir.

summary: The caller wants to know more about the sugar content in Sunfish Sweet and Salt biscuits, as they are diabetic. The ITC agent, Ramya, transfers the call to the Telugu-speaking agent, where they discuss the nutritional information and content of the biscuits. The caller also inquires about the availability of pure salt biscuits and oats biscuits from Sunfish. The agent offers to check if there are other options for diabetic patients and provides information about the nutritional contents of the Sunfish Active Oats variant. The call ends with the agent, thanking the caller and wishing them a great day.
cohere_points:
- User is calling to inquire about the ingredients in a particular brand of biscuits and enquire if they have a sugar free version
- The RTC employee transfers the call to a Telugu speaker who can help him
- They discuss the various flavors of the biscuits and offers suggestions
- The caller finally gets the information he needs and thanks the RTC employee for their help.
Topic:
1. Customer call transfer
2. Language preference
3. Product details inquiry
4. Diabetic patient concern
5. Nutritional information
6. Sunfish products
7. Biscuit options
8. Rajahmundry location
9. Department store availability
10. Oats biscuits suggestion
Resolution: The customer's issue is partially resolved as the Telugu agent provided information on the products available but did not address the specific sugar content concern for the diabetic patient.
Did the caller Displayed Empathy: Yes, the agent displayed empathy. For example, when the caller mentioned being a diabetic patient, the agent responded by trying to help with the sugar-free options, such as suggesting the Sunfish Marilite Active Oats Biscuit for health-conscious individuals.
